extendedInfo.description: There is no better way for the youngest kids and members of the house that spend a fun time and also exercise their mind. With Match 4 Family, a funny and colourful version of the classic memory game, your children and kids will train their short term memory, sensory sense with the funny in-game sounds and their visual memory.What is Match 4 Family? It is very simple, all you need to do is click the backs of the cards shown on the board, doing this, the card will rotate and show a picture, now you or your kids just have to guess or remember where is or was the card with the same image and match them. Does the mechanism of Match 4 Family sound familiar to you? Yes, exactly, is the classic and typical matching pairs game or better known as memory game!!!!The most important features of Match 4 Family are:       - Screens and Texts in English and Spanish       - Match 4 Family is in HD so it's perfect for playing in both mobile and tablets.       - Smooth animations that the kids and children will love.       - Sounds in each game situations.       - Four difficulty levels suitable for all ages (from the smallest kids to the daddies) and eligible in the set up menu.       - Four different groups of precious cards (animals, letters, transport and objects in the sky). All are selectable from the beginning of the game, no need to buy or unlock.With Match 4 Family your children and kids may exercise the following sensory capabilities:       - Develops and increases memory.       - Kids will be concentrated from the beginning.       - Increases brain capacity.       - Increases sensory and positional sense.Enjoy the game and let us know what you would include in Match 4 Family!!!

reviews.title: Mom
reviews.comment: Great for my autistic daughter.very colorful.she loves it.
reviews.author: Dorothy Willingham
